about_the_game:
🎵 Record Shop Simulator: Demo Edition 🎵

Step into the world of Record Shop Simulator with this exclusive demo! Experience 5 in-game days of music, management, and creativity as you lay the foundations of your very own record store.

🎶 Build and Customize Your Space
Start crafting your dream store with a selection of furniture and decorations. While the full range of customization options awaits in the full game, this demo gives you a taste of designing your cozy music haven.

📀 Curate a Limited Collection
Explore a curated selection of unique records and products to sell. Discover the joy of filling your shelves and attracting customers, but remember—this demo offers just a glimpse of the 90+ records and diverse inventory available in the full version.

🛒 Manage and Engage
Test your managerial skills with core store operations. Keep your space tidy, restock limited items, and interact with customers to get a feel for the daily life of a record store owner.

🚨 Protect Your Stock
Stay alert for shoplifters in this bite-sized demo. Experience the challenge of maintaining security and keeping your inventory safe.

🎧 Why Try the Demo?

  • Dive into the world of Record Shop Simulator for a limited 5-day trial.

  • Get a sneak peek at store customization and inventory management.

  • Experience the essentials of running a record store, from setup to sales.

Your journey to building the ultimate record shop starts here. Are you ready to hit play?

Step into the world of Record Shop Simulator with this exclusive demo! Experience 5 in-game days of music, management, and creativity as you lay the foundations of your very own record store.

name: Record Shop Simulator Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480

short_description: Dive into a slice of the ultimate record store experience! You have 5 in-game days to manage a limited selection of products, satisfy customers, and handle the daily challenges of running a music shop. Try your hand at building the record store of your dreams—are you ready to rock?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
